channel.title: Posts on Peyton Kort Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Peyton Kort Blog

item.title: Can you predict a Cinderella team?
item.description: Teams like VCU and UCLA have had incredible runs in March. Back in 2011, VCU made it all the way to the Final Four as an 11 seed. UCLA this year has made that exact same run as an 11 seed as well. But what do these two teams have in common. Both were a team that had to play in the First Four, which are the lowest at-large teams facing off against each other.

item.title: My NCAA Bracket
item.description: Bracket Analysis Second Header Third Level My bracket is a dumpster fire. Here’s why. library(tidyverse) ## ── Attaching packages ─────────────────────────────────────── tidyverse 1.3.0 ── ## ✓ ggplot2 3.3.3 ✓ purrr 0.3.4 ## ✓ tibble 3.0.5 ✓ dplyr 1.0.4 ## ✓ tidyr 1.1.2 ✓ stringr 1.4.0 ## ✓ readr 1.4.0 ✓ forcats 0.5.1 ## ── Conflicts ────────────────────────────────────────── tidyverse_conflicts() ── ## x dplyr::filter() masks stats::filter() ## x dplyr::lag() masks stats::lag()
